mapper.insert: insert into topic(topicid , usersid , vedioid , num , contents , addtime ) values(#{topicid} , #{usersid} , #{vedioid} , #{num} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update topic set usersid=#{usersid} , vedioid=#{vedioid} , num=#{num} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} where topicid=#{topicid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.title from topic a , users b , vedio c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.vedioid = c.vedioid order by topicid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.title from topic a , users b , vedio c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.vedioid = c.vedioid and topicid=#{topicid} order by topicid desc
